mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.code from ad_basic_type a where a.type = 3

SELECT it.floor_id floorId, b.`name`, b.`code`, b.sort sort, b.sub_title subTitle, b.floor_type floorType, tg.template_id templateId FROM ad_user u INNER JOIN ad_home_template_group tg ON u.group_num = tg.group_id INNER JOIN ad_home_template_item it ON it.template_id = tg.template_id INNER JOIN ad_basic_type b ON it.floor_id = b.id where u.id = #{userId} and b.type = #{type}
and tg.template_type = 0
and tg.template_type = 1
and GROUP BY it.floor_id ORDER BY b.sort
